org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.mapping

Class JsonAttributeMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.mapping.JsonAttributeMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeMapper<String>

    public class JsonAttributeMapper
extends Object
implements AttributeMapper<String>
    An AttributeMapper that takes its values from a JSON string.

    • Constructor Summary

      Default constructor if not being given any prefix parameter

      Constructor with a prefix that will be prepended to all mapped values.

      • JsonAttributeMapper

        public JsonAttributeMapper(String prefixedAttributesList,
                           String prefix)
        Constructor with a prefix that will be prepended to all mapped values.
        Parameters:
        prefixedAttributesList - Comma-separated list of attributes that need a prefix applied, or *.
        prefix - The prefix to be applied.

      • getAttributes

        public Map<String,Set<String>> getAttributes(Map<String,String> attributeMapConfiguration,
                                             String jsonText)
                                      throws AuthLoginException
        Maps from values found in the source to a map of keys in the result, according to a provided map of keys in the source to keys in the result.
        Specified by:
        getAttributes in interface AttributeMapper<String>
        Parameters:
        attributeMapConfiguration - The map of keys in the source to keys in the result.
        jsonText - The source of values.
        Returns:
        A map of attribute keys to values found.
        Throws:
        AuthLoginException
